page.title: 01 Introduction To The Area
page.content: The area of land we have surveyed is a rural area around Weethley and Arrow in Warwickshire,bordering Worcestershire. Our project looks at many different aspects such as land use, tourist attractions and old historical places. We have conducted interviews with people connected with Ragley Hall near Alcester as a main tourist attraction and have a report on the architecture. Also included is an account of "a day in the life of" a family from Weethley. We include a survey of housing types in the area and a survey of animal and bird life. There is a custom of Morris Dancing in Weethley which is an annual event and we have a report on that.We also include other interviews with local people to discover in more depth social and economic aspects of the area.
